## Price.trial\_period\_days property

Default number of trial days when subscribing a customer to this price using [trial\_from\_plan](https://stripe.com/docs/api#create_subscription-trial_from_plan)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly trial_period_days: number | null;
```
